body.name: Ihoming Twin Bassinets for Baby, Double Bassinet Bedside Sleeper for Twins, Double Bassinets Sleeper for 2 Babies, Infant Co Sleeper Bedside Crib Attaches to Bed, Khaki
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 6 hrs 34 mins
features: 【Double The Area Than Others】: Ihoming twin bassinet measures 37.5" x 35.5". The larger area brings greater comfort for baby 0-12 months or twins 0-6 months.
【Stable and Safe】: Made of premium aircraft grade aluminum alloy aluminum, lightweight and stable. With a maximum load of 175lbs, you don't need to worry about baby's safety.
【6 Adjustable Heights】: Our ihoming twin bassinet as a bed side sleeper can fit most bed, as its height can be adjusted from 29.5" to 35.5".
【Anti-Spitting Up Design】: To prevent your baby from choking on milk, Ihoming twin bassinet can be adjusted to a tilt angle of 10°.
【IHOMING BRAND QUALITY COMMITMENT】: We provide 30-day money back and 12-month warranty. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee for risk-free shopping!
body.description: Ihoming Twin Bassinet & Bedside Sleeper Why choose us? Our mission is to make babies and their family more comfortable and safe. We passionately focused on the interaction of fashion design, durable quality and attentive service. To ensure our products are safe and compliant, we have made many product design and quality improvements, and as you can see, we have been accepted by the CPSC and ASTM, which ensures our products are up to standard. Premium 6061 Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy 6 Adjustable Heights To Match Your Bed's Height Anti-Spitting Up Design To Protect Your Baby 2 Support Poles & Storage Bag & Packaging Bag

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brand Story Ihoming's 10 years is 10 years of exploration. From a small workshop of a few people to a company of 100 people with production, sales and technology, we have been committed to making your home life more cozy and comfortable. Ihoming thanks everyone who is with us. We hope Ihoming's products will bring you convenience and gain your approval. Ihoming Twin Bassinet & Bedside Sleeper Why choose us? Our mission is to make babies and their family more comfortable and safe. We passionately focused on the interaction of fashion design, durable quality and attentive service. To ensure our products are safe and compliant, we have made many product design and quality improvements, and as you can see, we have been accepted by the CPSC and ASTM, which ensures our products are up to standard. Premium 6061 Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy 6 Adjustable Heights To Match Your Bed's Height Anti-Spitting Up Design To Protect Your Baby 2 Support Poles & Storage Bag & Packaging Bag
Double The Area Than Others Ihoming twin bassinet measures 37.5" x 35.5". The larger area brings greater comfort for baby 0-12 months or twins 0-6 months.
Stable Stable and Stable To keep the twins safe, we use four strong poles, which provide more support than two separate bassinets.
Anti-Spitting Up Design To prevent your baby from choking on milk, Our Ihoming twin babies bassinet can be adjusted to a tilt angle of 0-10°.
6 Adjustable Heights Our ihoming twin bassinet as a bed side sleeper can fit most beds, as its height can be adjusted from 29.5" to 35.5".
More Detailes We also provide Breathable Mesh, Telescopic & Locked Leg and Soft & Washable Cushion. We hope Ihoming's products will bring you convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Aún no lo hemos montado pero se ve bien bonito

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It is absolutely amazing. The only problem I had is it was not delivered to my home. I had to pick it up after waiting on my front porch all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Es muy grande. Fácil de armar,firme, mis bebes lo adoran. La altura es buena aunque si tuviera unos inches mas sería excelente. Gran producto, vale la inversión, definitivamente lo recomiendo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would NOT use it once baby starts rolling (4 mo +)
reviews.reviewText: Bassinet was good for twins up to when they started rolling. I would NEVER use it for babies that are older than 4 mo old or once they learn to roll/seat up. I’m surprised it is suggested older babies can use this. It is absolutely not safe for a baby who rolls or seats / stands up to sleep or hang out here. Also sheets are slight problem as nothing fits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy bueno el producto pero pésimo el envío con USPS
reviews.reviewText: Vinieron 3 beses a entregar y no lo dejaban tube que con mi embarazo de alto riesgo y amenasa de aborto ir asta el coreo a recogerlo porque ellos no lo podían subir asta mi apartamento son un descaro muy mal servicio de paquetería recomiendo que lo cambien uno paga un envío para no tener que ir a recogerlo uno es una falta de respeto total con el cliente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I actually bought this for puppies and mom feeding time and it's just perfect. I can sit on a chair next to her while they are nursing. Too old to get down on the floor with her. It's been a life saver

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: Nice, simple, was worried but its better than expected. Perfect size for my bedside to be close to the twins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Zipper for divider faulty
reviews.reviewText: Product is good, things to improve:No sheets match this size exactly.Pull down flap doesn’t retract all the way down, so still have a mini wall for co sleeping.Pull down flap is only on one side so you have to reach over one side to get the other baby.!!! Zipper for divider didn’t work meaning we couldn’t attach and use it. One of the zips appeared to be sewn on upside down.
